title: Drawing, Design for a Square Dining Table on Scroll-Like Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Square Dining Table on Scroll-Like Feet
medium: Graphite, pen and red ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper center of image: 4'-6" square; across center right of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions; in blue color pencil, lower right portion of sheet: Mhy. L [box with dot inside] / EX / DA ["EX" in red ink]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Square molded top raised on fluted columnar support. sitting atop "X"-shaped molded base terminating in 4 scroll-like feet with carved rosettes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Square Dining Table on Scroll-Like Feet, 1900–05. Graphite, pen and red ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-147.
